description:
Safety on the trail or on concrete. This versatile helmet features an integrated visor and loads of vents, so it's ultra-comfortable when summer pops out in full force.

  • I-mould construction absorbs shock from impact without excess weight
  • Multi-directional Impact Protection System (MIPS) protects your brain from rotational forces
  • Integrated visor sheds rain and direct sunlighit
  • VaporFit system adjusts for a custom fit
  • AirEvac ventilation for optimal air flow
  • Performance liner manages moisture effectively and comfortably
  • Design works with sunglasses or secures them on top
name: Smith Convoy MIPS Helmet - Unisex
